importer-page.title: Import your artists
importer-page.tag1: Jukabox's importer is a Premium feature, it's available to all users just for a limited time.
importer-page.paragraph1: Jukabox isn't directly involved with song, album, and artist data; instead, it works with a third-party API called MusicBrainz. This API uses an identification system based on what they call MBID. An MBID is a 36 character Universally Unique Identifier that is permanently assigned to each entity in the database, i.e. artists, release groups, releases, recordings, works, labels, areas, places and URLs.
importer-page.paragraph2: To search and obtain the MBID of the artist to add:
importer-page.paragraph3: This process may take several minutes, depending on the amount of content the artist has.
importer-page.step1: Enter the MusicBrainz page through this link.
importer-page.step2: In the search box, insert the name of the artist you want to add to Jukabox.
importer-page.step3: From the results obtained, select the desired one.
importer-page.step4: Once on the artist's page, go to details and there you will find the MBID.
